actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that social security taxes shall not apply to payments made to State and local government employees under law in the nature of workmen's compensation acts.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Social Security Act to revise the exemption from social security taxes of sickness or accident disability payments under workers' compensation acts.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that social security taxes shall not apply to payments made to State and local government employees under law in the nature of workmen's compensation acts.
